SECONDARY_LEGEND: FSsolutions is a software development company that provides solutions for everyone, everywhere.
HOW_WE_WORK_INFORMATION: Imagine us as part of your team, not as an external provider. Together, we will make your ideas come true without complications. You only need to follow three steps to achieve it

FIRST_STEP.TITLE: First meet
FIRST_STEP.DESCRIPTION: The first step is to have a meeting to understand your needs and requirements. We will discuss the project and establish a budget.

SECOND_STEP.TITLE: We start with the project
SECOND_STEP.DESCRIPTION: If you agree with our budget and timeline, our design and development team will begin working on your idea.

THIRD_STEP.TITLE: The results
THIRD_STEP.DESCRIPTION: We will have periodic meetings to show you the progress of your project.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our services
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: We offer software solutions for all types of clients. If you can dream it, we can make it happen. We work from the beginning to the launch.
SERVICES.FINAL_MESSAGE: Book a meeting and start your tour with us

FIRST_SERVICE_ITEM.TITLE: Software development for companies
FIRST_SERVICE_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Boost your company's growth with software solutions, meticulously designed to ensure business success.

SECOND_SERVICE_ITEM.TITLE: Ecommerce
SECOND_SERVICE_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Our ecommerce solutions simplify and optimize transactions, offering customers a complete and satisfactory shopping experience.

THIRD_SERVICE_ITEM.TITLE: Landing page
THIRD_SERVICE_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Impact from the first click. Our landing pages are strategically crafted to convert visitors into committed customers.

FOURTH_SERVICE_ITEM.TITLE: Management panels
FOURTH_SERVICE_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Optimizes control and efficiency. Our management panels are designed to simplify administration and improve decision making

PROJECTS_SECTION.TITLE: Solutions developed and turned into reality.
PROJECTS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Each client is essential for us. Our team takes care of each project from start to finish with very good results. Come check it out for yourself.

LALA.DESCRIPTION: Development of a management panel that allows you to control the stock of products with their price, characteristics, details, etc., list of clients and their checking accounts and allow the sale of your products, the software informs through notifications when there is little left stock of a certain product, a customer falls behind on a payment on their checking account. It also allows you to export the list of clients and products in PDF, and send a PDF of the current account details to clients via WhatsApp.
LALA.TECHNOLOGIES: Vue.js, Vuex, Vue-Router, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Laravel, PHP, MySQL,

MODULAR.DESCRIPTION: Development of a management panel that allows employees to compare products from different suppliers. When loading is finished, the panel shows the user the best purchase option according to different values. Additionally, when generating a new budget, an email with an access link is sent to the different suppliers, so they can enter and upload their prices for the different products.
MODULAR.TECHNOLOGIES: Vue.js, Vuex, Vue-Router, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Laravel, PHP, MySQL, PHPMyAdmin

BURGUER.DESCRIPTION: Development of a digital menu with a shopping cart that allows customers to select the products and quantity they wish to purchase. Those in charge of the commercial premises that purchase these products have a management panel to be able to add, modify and delete products, categories and promotions.
BURGUER.TECHNOLOGIES: Vue.js, Vuex, Vue-Router, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Laravel, PHP, MySQL, PHPMyAdmin

LALO.DESCRIPTION: Development of a landing page that allows you to view the available stock of vehicles along with their details. In addition, the firm's employees have access to a management panel to create, update and modify vehicles, brands and categories, which are reflected directly on the landing page, as well as control their clients' quotas. Show notifications when it's a customer's birthday or a payment is due.
LALO.TECHNOLOGIES: Vue.js, Vuex, Vue-Router, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Laravel, PHP, MySQL, PHPMyAdmin

ABOUT_US_SECTION.TITLE: How nice to see you here!
ABOUT_US_SECTION.FG_DESCRIPTION: Hello everyone, I am Fernando Gonzalez, creator of FSsolutions. It is a pleasure to be here to talk to you about our company. FSsolutions is a software development company, created from scratch with the aim of helping clients around the world transform their ideas into innovative technological solutions.

FIRST_TIME.TITLE: Beginnings
FIRST_TIME.DESCRIPTION: From our humble beginnings, we have grown into a software development team that strives to deliver high-quality products and tailored solutions to meet the needs of our customers.

SECOND_TIME.TITLE: Our team
SECOND_TIME.DESCRIPTION: We have a small, diverse team of developers, designers and project managers. This compact structure allows us to work in an agile and personalized way, offering innovative and high-quality solutions.

THIRD_TIME.TITLE: Developing solutions
THIRD_TIME.DESCRIPTION: We have had the privilege of working with clients from diverse industries, from startups to large corporations, providing solutions that have fueled their growth and success.

FOURTH_TIME.TITLE: Our mission continues
FOURTH_TIME.DESCRIPTION: At FSsolutions, we are committed to continuous innovation and expansion of our services to continue offering cutting-edge solutions that help our clients achieve their goals.

FOLLOW_US_SECTION.TITLE: Connect with us
FOLLOW_US_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Join our community on social networks, where we share our passion for software development and design with hundreds of users like you. Come and collaborate with us!

FINAL_MESSAGE_SECTION.TITLE: Ready to develop your ideas?
FINAL_MESSAGE_SECTION.MESSAGE: We're here to help you bring your ideas to life with our expertise in software development and design.

FOOTER_SECTION.MESSAGE: FSsolutions is a software development company that provides solutions for everyone, everywhere.
